name: ANS | [GRC/TECH] - Management of privileged users and service accounts.
description: A process to manage user authorizations must be defined and applied. In particular, an up-to-date record should be maintained of the users or profiles of users who have access to personal data or to the information systems used to process personal data.
testingInformation:
1. A process to manage authorizations has been defined and implemented.
2. Up-to-date record precising the list of user and accounts having access to personal data should be available.
3. Periodic account and privilege review should be scheduled and conducted.
actionPlanInstructions: Define, implement and automate a procedure framing the governance of users and service accounts processing personal data.
actionPlanTitle: Procedure to manage privileged users not in place.

controlMappingSources.sourceName: Governance risk and compliance | Cloud engineer
controlMappingSources.troubleshootingText:
1. A tagging strategy can be used to quickly identify user profile and credentials that have access to personal data.
2. AWS Cloudtrail can be used to analyse the actions performed by user.
